task: Input: processed MERFISH AnnData (mouse brain). Using expression-only data from the processed MERFISH mouse brain AnnData, perform one-vs-all t-test differential expression per cluster (logFC > 0, adj p ≤ 0.05), rank genes by logFC then −log₁₀(p_adj), use feature_name for gene symbols,convert to uppercase gene symbols (deduplicate, remove Ensembl IDs), identify clusters expressing astrocyte markers, and return the combined astrocyte marker genes in top genes from those astrocyte clusters as markers_predicted.

scoring.description: Pass if Jaccard ≥ 0.50 (≥80% overlap with 8 GT markers using top-13).
